lead_paragraph: The Seattle SuperSonics’ Kevin Durant, the second overall pick in the N.B.A. draft, and his teammate Nick Collison were cut from the national team as the United States set its 12-player roster for the Olympic qualifying tournament. The event begins tomorrow in Las Vegas. On the team are Kobe Bryant, LeBron James, Carmelo Anthony, Amare Stoudemire, Dwight Howard, Jason Kidd, Chauncey Billups, Michael Redd, Mike Miller, Tyson Chandler, Tayshaun Prince and Deron Williams.
